Title: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (based on the series of graphic novels by), Tony Moore (based on the series of graphic novels by), Charlie Adlard (based on the series of graphic novels by), Scott M. Gimple
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: Having been brutally overpowered by Negan and his Saviors, Rick and the group kneel helplessly as they suffer heavy losses that will haunt them forever.
